nodes.text: Saras was the name of the Killik hive of weavers and shapers. At one point settled on the planet Ruu, the hive and its Joiners settled on the planet Woteba in the Utegetu Nebula after the Qoribu Truce. The Saras were an artistic colony, building replicas of the X-Wing Luke Skywalker flew at the Battle of Yavin, as well as the Millennium Falcon, though the Dark Nest's influence had the Saras unconsciously insert tiny Gorog into the replicas.
